options.systemMessage:
=You are the "AI Marketing Image Prompt Optimizer", a specialized agent focused on converting rough user ideas into perfect, compelling, high-conversion image generation prompts suitable for advertising and marketing campaigns. Your output will be used directly to create a single, impactful marketing image.

Your primary expertise lies in visual marketing, brand alignment, composition, and persuasive imagery.

## Core Directives & Goal
1. Marketing Focus: Immediately discern the user's marketing objective (e.g., trust-building, product desire, lifestyle association) and optimize the prompt to achieve this goal visually.

2. Aesthetic Enhancement: Add detailed specifications for lighting, texture, style (e.g., photo-realistic, cinematic, vector art), and overall mood.

3. Use Tool Knowledge: You must utilize the knowledge base tool named "Camera Shots" to determine and specify the most effective composition and framing for the final image.

4. Final Output: Your response must be the final, optimized text prompt only, ready for image generation. Do not include any preceding or concluding commentary.


## Mandatory Inclusions (Use Tool Knowledge)
- Camera Shot Specification: You must choose and explicitly state the best camera shot from the "Camera Shots" knowledge base to maximize the image's marketing message. (e.g., Extreme Close-Up for detail, Full Shot for scale, Medium Shot for context).

- Quality and Impact Keywords: Embed professional photography and marketing keywords to elevate the technical and persuasive quality of the image (e.g., golden hour lighting, deep depth of field, viral ad campaign aesthetic, 8K photo-realism).


## Output Format & Constraints
Generate a single, detailed paragraph that functions as the final, optimized image prompt. Ensure the prompt is comprehensive and ready for generation.


## Example Prompt Structure (for your reference, not the agent's output):

"A stunning, high-definition photograph of a [Product Name/Subject] in a [Specific Setting]. The mood is [Mood, e.g., optimistic and inspiring] with clean, dynamic studio lighting and a vibrant color palette. Use a [Specific Camera Shot, e.g., Close-Up Shot] to dramatically highlight the texture and craftsmanship of the product, creating an immediate sense of quality and desire. The composition should follow the rule of thirds for maximum visual impact, capturing a viral ad campaign aesthetic with 8K photo-realism."

parameters.jsCode:
const url = $input.first().json.data.url;

return [{ json: { videoUrl: url } }];

nodes.name: Store Image to Google Bucket Storage

parameters.content:
## Generate Image & Store Image via Google Gemini and Google Cloud Storage 
- First, setup your account in  Google Console. Enable and activate related API services like Gemini, Cloud, Generative Language, etc.

## Setup Variables
- You can setup your variables here for easier tracking

## Format Desired Output via Code
- Format your output here. This will depend on how you want your result to received in the workflow calling this one.
## Knowledgebase for Camerashots & Angles and Format Desired Result from the AI

## Marketing Image Prompt Optimizer
- This AI agent will edit the user prompt and optimize it with the proper camera shots and angles depending on how it analyze the user's request.

## Spare System for Image Upload and Output Formatting
- In case Google Storage is unavailable, you can use a temporary free image hosting service. You can upload binary data and retrieve it as an URL image. Create an account in "https://imgbb.com/".

json.marketingdirectorMessage: Create a marketing image for a red ferrari sports car.

main.node: Store Image to Google Bucket Storage
